title: Correct unzip command path in `workflow_run` docs
author: jjonescz
details: Fixed the `unzip` command path in a GitHub Actions workflow example
Corrected the source path from `pr_number.zip` to `${{ runner.temp }}/artifacts/pr_number.zip`
Ensures artifact unzipping uses the proper temp directory location
summary:
- Fixed the `unzip` command path in a GitHub Actions workflow example
- Corrected the source path from `pr_number.zip` to `${{ runner.temp }}/artifacts/pr_number.zip`
- Ensures artifact unzipping uses the proper temp directory location
- Documentation-only change for `workflow_run` event examples
generated_title: Fix artifact unzip path in workflow_run documentation
